messages.title: Barnsley voted for Brexit.
messages.content: I will ensure that will of Brexit will work for our local economy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that the will of Brexit works for the local economy.
Fight for fairer funding for our Barnsley schools.
Ensure the NHS and social care services continues to serve the people of Barnsley.
